titleStmt.title: A gagge for the Pope, and the Iesuits: or The arraignement, and execution of Antichrist Shevving plainely, that Antichrist shall be discouered, and punished in this vvorld: to the amasement of all obstinate papists.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] D[awson] for Edward Blackmore, and are to be sould at his shop, at the great south-dore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
